categories.title: Official Apple Blogs
categories.description: All of the iOS development related blogs from our dear friends at the small fruit company in Cupertino.

categories.title: iOS Development Blogs
categories.description: No matter if it covers Swift or Objective-C, whether it's focused on app architecture or UI coding. As long as it's related to iOS development then it belongs here.

sites.title: Appbot
sites.author: Stuart Hall, Claire McGregor, Christie Hunter

categories.title: iOS Development Company Blogs
categories.description: If a blog is published by a company rather than an individual (or group) of individuals, but is still related to iOS development. This is where you'll find it!

categories.description: Channels on YouTube that cover a variety of topics around iOS development.

categories.title: Inactive Blogs
categories.description: If a site is related to iOS development, design, or anything related, but hasn't been updated in more than a year it'll be moved here.

categories.title: iOS Geliştirici Blogları
categories.description: Uygulama mimarisi ve kullanıcı arayüzü geliştirmeye odaklı bloglardır, Swift veya Objective-C dillerini ayırmaksızın doğrudan iOS geliştirme ile alakalı olanlar burada listenecektir.

categories.title: iOS Development Blogs
categories.description: 앱 아키텍쳐부터 UI 코딩까지 Swift, Objective-C에 상관없이 iOS 개발과 관련된 블로그라면 모두 여기에 속합니다.
